title: Géotechnique Lecture
text:
The Géotechnique lecture is an biennial lecture on the topic of <a href="soil%20mechanics">soil mechanics</a>, organised by the <a href="British%20Geotechnical%20Association">British Geotechnical Association</a> named after its major scientific journal Géotechnique.
This should not be confused with the annual <a href="British%20Geotechnical%20Association">BGA</a> <a href="Rankine%20Lecture">Rankine Lecture</a>.
